greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A249721: a(n) = 1 if there are either no 1-digits at all in base-3 representation of n, or if there are exactly two 1's next to each other, a(n) = 0 in any other cases.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..59049
formula: If n is even and 9 ∤ C(n,n/2), then a(n) = 1, otherwise a(n) = 0.
example: n A007089(n) a(n) = 1 if 1-free, except for possibly a single 11-pair,
program: (Scheme) (define (A290079 n) (if (in_A249721? n) 1 0)) ;; See under A249721 for in_A249721?
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 25 2017
